    • reset

      public void reset()
      Called when the user clicks the reset button. Reset the filter.

    • filter

      public void filter()
      Called when the user clicks the filter button. Filter the records according to the filter.

    • filterCourses

      public static List<Course> filterCourses(String courseID, String courseName, String department)
      Retrieve records from the database.
      Parameters:
      courseID - the filter for course ID.
      courseName - the filter for course name.
      department - the filter for department.
      Returns:
      a list of records matches the filter.

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Called when the user selects a record and clicks delete button. Delete the selected record from the database.

    • deleteCourse

      private void deleteCourse(boolean deleteExam)
      Perform the deletion. Called by delete() only.
      Parameters:
      deleteExam - Only visible to programmer. A course that has exams will only be deleted when deleteExam is true. Default to be false when called by delete(), and a warning will be sent to the user. The function calls itself again and set deleteExam to be true when the user clicks OK.

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Called when the user clicks the refresh button, also automatically called after add/delete/update. Initialize the table, choice boxes and buttons.

    • add

      public void add()
      Called when the user clicks the add button. Create and add a record according to the form.

    • addCourse

      public static void addCourse(String courseID, String courseName, String department)
      Add the record to the database.
      Parameters:
      courseID - the course ID of the new course.
      courseName - the course name of the new course.
      department - the department of the new course.

    • update

      public void update()
      Called when the user selects a record and clicks the update button. Update the selected record according to the form.

    • updateCourse

      public static void updateCourse(Course selectedCourse, String courseID, String courseName, String department)
      Perform the update in the database.
      Parameters:
      selectedCourse - the course to be updated.
      courseID - the new course ID.
      courseName - the new course name.
      department - the new department.
